source: Compiled from Virgin Voyages official site, VV Insider, Cruise Lowdown, Freestyle Travelers, Magical Traveller, CamJon Travel, Cruise Gear, Parks & Waves
disclaimer: All dining on Virgin Voyages is included in the cruise fare unless noted. Menus change seasonally and may vary by ship. Drink prices subject to change.

the-wake.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Raw bar supplements and premium items extra.

starters: Clam Chowder — Yukon Gold Potato, Bacon, Chive Batons
Corn Custard & Black Bean Salad — Tomatillo, Peppadew, Cilantro (V)
Wedge Salad — Smoked Bacon, Hard Boiled Egg, Blue Cheese
Hamachi Crudo — Pickled Rhubarb, Hibiscus, Basil
Roasted Bone Marrow — Pickled Red Onion, Fresh Herbs, Toasted Brioche
mains: Crispy Polenta — Roasted Tomato, Corn, Peppadew, Basil (VV, GF)
Shrimp & Grits — Andouille Sausage, Peppers, Onions
Pan Roasted Atlantic Salmon — Lemon, Capers, Brown Butter (GF)
Salt-Baked Dorade — Fennel, Citrus, Olive Oil (GF)
sides: Brown Butter Roasted Wild Mushrooms (V, GF)
desserts: The Wake — Chocolate Mousse, Shortcrust, Caramel Cremoso, Hazelnuts
Meyer Lemon Cheesecake (V) — Blackberry Compote & Cinnamon Cookie Crumble
Baked Alaska (V) — Pistachio Ice Cream, Hazelnut Sponge Cake, Toasted Meringue
Apple Tatin (V) — Caramelized Apple, Almond Financier, Mascarpone Cream
Coconut "Panna Cotta" (VV, GF) — Fresh Berries, Candied Orange, Pinenut Granola

raw-bar: Petit Plateau ($45) — 1/2 Maine Lobster, Oysters, Poached Shrimp, Steamed Mussels, Snow Crab Claws, Clams
Grand Plateau ($85) — Whole Maine Lobster, Oysters, Crawfish, Poached Shrimp, Clams, Steamed Mussels, Snow Crab Claws, Alaskan King Crab Legs
notes: Modern steakhouse with 1950s glamour. Tableside martini mixologist available.
Brunch available 8am–1pm with bottomless drink option ($35).
The most popular restaurant onboard — book first when reservations open.
Sides are shareable. Sauce flight available with grill items.

pink-agave.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Treat Yourself premium items extra.

botanas: Guacamole — Pomegranate Seeds, Jalapeño, Totopos (VV, GF)
Chayote Yucateco — Mexican Squash, Habanero Pepper, Baby Carrots (VV, GF)
Esquites — Grilled Corn, Spicy Aioli, Lime (V, GF)
entradas: Camarón Amarillo — Seared Shrimp, Mole Amarillo, New Potatoes (GF)
Enchilada de Pollo — Roasted Chicken, Salsa Verde, Crema (GF)
Papas con Chorizo — Yukon Gold Potatoes, Onion, Garlic (GF)
fuertes: Relleno Vegano — Russet Potato and Roasted Corn Stuffed Poblano Pepper (VV, GF)
Pescado — Grilled Striped Bass, Mole Verde, Salsa de Xoconostle (GF)
Pato — Roasted Duck, Mole Ahumado, Smoked Yam Purée (GF)
Cochinita Pibil — Achiote-Marinated Smoked Pork & Sour Orange Habanero Pico de Gallo (GF)
Bistec Marinero en Escabeche — Ribeye Steak, Oaxaca Cheese, Chile Ancho
desserts: Tamal de Chocolate — Chocolate Masa, Mexican Chocolate, Fruit Salsa (VV, GF)
Milhojas — Tamarind, Passion Fruit, Pineapple, Puff Pastry (V)
Tacos de Chocolate — Mexican Chocolate, Canela, Dulce de Leche

premium: Pescado Zarandeado ($55) — Achiote Halibut, Lobster, Bay Scallops (GF)
notes: Almost entirely gluten-free menu — best restaurant choice for gluten-free diners.
Widest assortment of mezcal and tequila at sea. Tom Dixon-designed interior.
Dishes served as small (botanas), medium (entradas), and large (fuertes) plates — shareable format.
Dinner only. One of the most popular restaurants; book early.

extra-virgin.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Fresh truffles supplement extra.

antipasto: Ribollita — Cannellini Beans, Escarole Salsa Verde, Country Bread (V)
Romaine & Frisée Salad — White Anchovies, Croutons, Six-Minute Egg
Crispy Artichokes — Caper Aioli & Charred Lemon (V)
Semolina Fried Calamari — Lemon, Creamy Chili Dip
Smoked Chicken Liver Mousse — Grilled Ciabatta & Balsamic Agrodolce
Wagyu Beef Carpaccio — Chanterelles, Sunchokes, Truffle Dressing (GF)
Braised Mini Meatballs — San Marzano Tomato, Smoked Mozzarella, Pancetta
affettati-misti: Formaggi — 24-Month Aged Parmigiano, Pecorino Romano, Gorgonzola
Served with Wildflower Honey, Pear Mostarda, Rosemary Spiced Nuts, Eggplant Caponata
pasta: Potato Gnocchi — Hen of the Woods Mushrooms, Spinach, Truffle Butter Sauce (V)
Spaghetti alle Vongole — Little Neck Clams, White Wine, Crushed Red Pepper
Nero Gemelli Seafood Pasta — Mussels, Shrimp, Chili, Sea Urchin Sauce
Bucatini Carbonara — Egg Yolk, Pecorino Romano, Black Pepper, Pancetta
Pappardelle al Ragù — Beef Bolognese & Parmigiano-Reggiano
Oxtail Agnolotti — Tangerine Conserva & Beef Tendon Crisps
secondo: Brussels Sprouts Arrabbiata — Polenta, Calabrian Chiles, Hazelnuts (V, GF)
Grilled Mediterranean Sea Bass — Lemon, Roasted Fennel, Yukon Gold Potato (GF)
Braised Pork Cheek — Chanterelle Mushrooms, Arrowleaf Spinach, Crispy Pork
Spatchcocked Grilled Young Chicken — Caper Berries, Pickled Celery, Piccata Sauce
Porcini-Rubbed New York Strip — Calabrian Chili Butter, Farro, Sautéed Escarole
dolci: Chocolate Olive Oil Cake — Red Wine Poached Pears and Candied Almonds (VV)
Ricotta Bomboloni — Vanilla Mascarpone & Black Currant Compote (V)
Chestnut Castagnaccio — Whipped Ricotta, Apples, Candied Pine Nuts (GF)
affogato: Choice of Homemade Gelatos and Condimenti Topped with Espresso
Sorbetti (V, GF) — Limoncello, Raspberry Rose, Mango Lime

premium: Add Fresh Truffles to Any Dish ($15)
notes: All pasta is made fresh onboard and cooked to order. Half-portions available to try multiple dishes.
Dinner only. Cicchetti (small bites) also available as a lighter option.
One of the most popular restaurants — book early.

gunbae.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Treat Yourself premium items extra.

small-bites: Miyeok Muchim — Seaweed Salad, Cucumber, Shiitake Mushrooms (VV, GF)
Haemul Pajeon — Mixed Seafood & Scallion Pancake
Dakgangjeong — Forever Crispy Chicken, Pickled Daikon, Chili Sauce
rice-noodles-stews: Bibimbap — Short Grain Rice, Egg, Mixed Vegetables (V, GF)
Japchae — Stir-Fried Vegetables, Egg, Vermicelli Noodles (V, GF)
Kimchi-Jjigae — Kimchi Stew, Pork Belly, Gochujang
bbq-grill: Boesut Yache Modum — Assorted Mushrooms & Seasonal Vegetable Combo (VV, GF)
Ojingeo, Nakji & Saewoo — Squid, Octopus, Shrimp (GF)
Kalbi Samgyeopsal Saewoo Modum — Chef's Combo: Short Ribs, Pork Belly, Shrimp (GF)
desserts: Soft Serve — Sikhye (V), Black Sesame (V, GF), or Sikhye/Black Sesame Twist (V)
Served with Black Sesame Granola, Mini Marshmallows, Miso Caramel

premium: Wagyu Beef Platter ($45) — Miyazaki Ribeye & Tenderloin
notes: Complimentary round of soju for the table to start. Interactive Korean drinking games.
BBQ grill served with choice of white rice, brown rice, or kimchi fried rice.
Flameless grills built into each table. Best enjoyed with a group — go hungry.
Menu verified from PDF source. A 2025 refresh may have updated some items — check onboard for latest offerings.

razzle-dazzle.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Fresh juices and smoothies extra ($6–$9).

brunch-eggs: Razzle Dazzle Breakfast — Eggs Your Way, Roasted Mushrooms, Yukon Gold Potatoes (V, GF)
dinner-if-you-must: Everything Crusted Salmon — Crushed Yukon Gold Potato, Pickled Vegetables, Mustard Sauce (GF)
dinner-naughty: Black Garlic Bowtie Pasta — Fennel Braised Pork, Chanterelles, Rainbow Swiss Chard
Fried Chicken — 1/2 Fried Chicken, Buttered Cholula Hot Sauce
1/2 Ginger Beer Chicken — Charred Coconut Green Beans, Roasted Squash (GF)
Pretzel Pork Schnitzel — Red Cabbage Slaw, Kimchi 1000 Island
milk-and-cookies: Mudslide — Stuffed Red Velvet, Matcha White Chocolate
Cocoa-O's — Coconut-Chocolate Chip, Coffee & Date Newton
Choose One Milk: Toasted Cinnamon Cereal (V), Biscoff Cookie (V), or Vanilla Cinnamon-Almond (VV, GF)

notes: Vegetarian-forward restaurant with a separate 'Naughty' section for meat/fish dishes at dinner.
Three distinct menus: brunch, lunch, and dinner. Brunch is the most popular service.
On Scarlet Lady, this venue is Lucky Lotus (Chinese-inspired). On Brilliant Lady, it is Rojo (Spanish-inspired).
Milk & Cookies dessert section — choose your cookie and milk pairing.

the-test-kitchen.pricing: Complimentary (included in cruise fare). Drink pairings extra ($25 beer/non-alcoholic, $35 wine/cocktail).

experience: 6-course mystery tasting menu — only key ingredients listed on the menu card
Menu rotates between A, B, and C across voyages
Chef Matt Lambert (Michelin-starred) crafted the experience
Each course is a surprise presentation — e.g., mushroom paté shaped like a real mushroom

notes: Laboratory-styled decor inspired by Escoffier's Ma Cuisine. Courses are small but complete.
Menus A and C are offered most frequently. Menu alternates based on voyage length.
Also hosts a 60-minute tea exploration and a hands-on chocolate-making class (Let's Get Choco-Lit).
Typically has the most availability of the main restaurants.

stations: Well Bread — Bakery with pastries, flatbreads, and fresh-baked goods
The Sweet Side — Pastries in the morning, desserts in the afternoon
Hot off the Press — Paninis and sandwiches for breakfast and lunch
Burger Grill — Pancakes and French toast (breakfast), burgers (all day)
Let's Taco About It — Breakfast burritos (morning), tacos and fish tacos (lunch/dinner)
Bento Baby / The Sushi Bar — Fruit boxes by day, sushi and bento boxes at night
Noodle Around — Ramen and miso soups
The Daily Mix — Soups, salads, cereal, and bagels
Diner & Dash — 24-hour omelets, English breakfast, hot beef sandwiches
notes: Food hall concept replacing the traditional cruise buffet. Counter-service ordering at each station.
Open 24/7. Self-service beverages including soft drinks, juice, tea, coffee, wine, beer, and cider.
Grab-and-go options always available. No reservations needed.

items: Chicken Pesto — Basil Pesto, Mozzarella, Red Onions, Fresh Tomatoes
Pretty Fly for a White Pie — Mozzarella, Ricotta, Parmesan, Roasted Garlic, Oregano (V)
Build Your Own — Custom brick-oven pizza with choice of toppings
notes: Brick oven pizza with beach club-inspired setting. Gluten-free options available.
Lunch service 11:30am–6:30pm, late-night 9pm–1:30am.

small-plates: Fresh Meat and Seafood Skewers — Flame Grilled to Order

notes: Mediterranean-inspired lounge on Deck 7 Aft. Indoor (Dock House) and outdoor (Dock) seating.
Perfect for light bites and sharing plates. Cocktail bar with spritzes and sangria.
Roman & Williams design with upholstered seating and ocean views.
Upper deck pool area. Limited hours: daily 12–5pm.
Customizable bowls with choice of protein and toppings.

items: 6 rotating flavors daily — homemade ice cream and gelato
notes: Open daily 11:30am–10pm on Deck 7.

grounds-club.pricing: Drip coffee and tea complimentary. Barista drinks extra ($5.50–$6).
notes: Two locations: Deck 7 and The Galley. Grounds Club Too in The Galley transforms into a cocktail bar at night on Scarlet/Brilliant Lady.

ship-eats.pricing: $7 delivery fee (waived with alcoholic beverage order)
notes: 24/7 in-cabin room service. Order via the Virgin Voyages app.

sip-lounge.pricing: Drinks à la carte. Afternoon tea $19 (or $39 with fizz).

afternoon-tea: Scones with Strawberry Jam and Clotted Cream
Large Selection of Loose Leaf Teas

notes: Premium wine and craft cocktail lounge. Afternoon tea daily 1–4pm.
Sophisticated setting for pre-dinner drinks or celebratory toasts.
Largest bar onboard in the Roundabout atrium. Live entertainment most nights.
Popular nighttime haunt — can be busy during peak hours.

draught-haus.pricing: Drinks à la carte. Bottled beer $5–$6, craft drafts $7–$9.
notes: Industrial-style craft beer bar on Deck 7. Growler/jug service available for cabins.
Brighton-inspired nautical pub. Brass ship's bell rings for quiz and game announcements.

the-social-club.pricing: Drinks à la carte. Floats and shakes extra.
notes: Gaming lounge with arcade games, shuffleboard, and board games on Deck 7.

the-manor.pricing: Entertainment included. Drinks à la carte.
notes: Two-story nightclub inspired by Richard Branson's first recording studio.
Headline shows nightly that transition into late-night dancing.
Three bars across two levels. Live performances every night.
THE place to be after dark.
Convenient bar adjacent to the casino floor on Deck 6.
Often quicker service than On The Rocks during busy times.

gym-and-tonic.pricing: Drinks à la carte. Fresh juices/smoothies ~$9.
notes: Pool-adjacent bar between the gym and whirlpool on Deck 15.
Main pool deck bar with vintage Hollywood aesthetic and purple loungers on Deck 15.
1920s NYC sports club style on Deck 16. Daybed lounging and catamaran net access with wake views.
Upper deck bar on Deck 16 with red bistro tables and cabanas overlooking the Aquatic Club.

richards-rooftop.pricing: Exclusive to Rockstar and Mega-Rockstar Suite guests
notes: VIP-only lounge on Deck 16 Forward. Tom Dixon Design Research Studio interior.
Access restricted to Rockstar Suite guests and above.
